text: Nasreddin in Bukhara () is a 1943 Soviet comedy movie directed by Yakov Protazanov.Живы ли киностудии республик СССР?Насреддин в Бухаре It stars Lev Sverdlin, M. Mirzakarimova, and Konstantin Mikhailov. The movie is based on the novel by Leonid Solovyov Disturber of the Peace about Nasreddin. ==Actors== * Lev Sverdlin - Nasreddin * M. Mirzakarimova - Gyuldjan * Konstantin Mikhailov - The Emir * Emmanuil Geller - Djafar * Vasili Zaychikov - Niyaz, Gyuldjan's father * Stepan Kayukov - Bakhtiyar, the wazir == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1943 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov
title: Nasreddin in Bukhara
